item.title: Memory Management in JavaScript and Necessity of Spread Operator in React
item.description: Memory Management in JavaScript and Necessity of Spread Operator in React Descartes believed dualism of mind and body,he thought they couldn’t have the same origin since body is divisible,while mind is not; only one difference was enough to make two different objects according to him. Let’s think the two identical pencils are produced in the factory, everything but their positions in the world is matched so they are not exactly same.
